post.body: And what would that be?
I'm not speaking, it's for a big agency chain to present to their partners...it's a fairly chilled way to spend the morning :)
Because I speak truths....and @MrTweet knows this. Having said that, he never sent me a report :(
Or if you want to renovate yourself choose keywords like 'needs work'
Search by whatever location you want, then go to keywords on the left and select 'renovated'. I can see 5500 odd across UK :)
Yes...and then it will snow on Christmas day, even in Texas.
Greg doesn't understand how I can watch every single episode a zillion times over, I guess it's just nice to zone out after work!
Ooooh game on girlfriend!
It's true baby! And I'll need someone strong to carry my bags when we go shopping, you get first dibs to be PA (Poppy Assistant)
Dude, @PhoenixReGuy's daughter picked my name out of a hat!Let's get drunk and eat Midnight Darks for a week (and learn and stuff)
I'll be there from Tuesday the 6th of Jan to Sunday the 11th Jan :-D
Keep calm and carry on, you can make a voodoo doll of the lazy idiot later.
Hell yes a hotdog dog http://tinyurl.com/2umft5
I went to a 'closing sale' at Brighton Woolies on Sunday, the dvd box sets were reduced to..OMG..normal internet prices!
Yep, arriving midday on the 6th and leaving first thing on the 11th.
Terrified of lobsters, I can't even look at one...could NEVER eat one!
My experience in the last month has been perfect.
I like Poppity, but that sounds even more like property. Pop'n'Fresh is cute too.At home I'm called Geoff, but that's a long story!
Everyone here mumbles so it's hard to tell. Why do boys mumble? I've never met a girl who mumbles.
I'll take lots of pics and video, don't you worry! ;)
Not for me, I fly to Israel Monday morning. w00t w00t! And calories don't count in December, that's a rule.
Hehe, yes I forgot leweb was going on as I asked that :D
The seashell baubles really set it off. It's a handsome tree :)
Lol, it can be Joe if he'll fix my washing machine!
Some good news at last! Look forward to seeing it :)
I seem to have ended up using the laptop which is a particular fan of the blue screen of death. My brain is too dead to function
Yep, I'm away now until the 29th of December.
A surprising number of my twitter pals around the globe are also hungover, it's a nice collective headachey feeling :)
Mmmmmm good call. I <3 water.
Stuck in traffic but on my way! Am i only one missing?!
How?
Hehehehe. Nothing is as bad as that :p
Have a fantastic time :) Sorry to miss you but I will raise a hafooch to you from the other end of the country.
Wahey :) Please wear your Supergirl suit...I imagine you actually wear it doing business.
Hehe, good. Sorry I missed it but believe there's another in Jan.
Very close to Israel's border with Egypt :)
Hehe. It is mean huh. But at least you have Eastenders...I feel so out of the loop already!
You're right. I'm going to bed and I will thank you Richard when I'm well rested in the morning :-D
The par-tay was amazing, we all had a rather wild time. Cannot wait to see you in NY either!
On the plus side, I can spend every working day searching for new places to live and say I'm doing usability testing ;)
February at the earliest, it's a pain because the apartment itself is very nice :(
It's junkies......this disgusting part of London is full of them.
It's definitely holiday! Exploring, relaxing, eating and sleeping :)
Eilat :)
Oooh mazel tov on the new gig, good luck behaving ;)
We are but unfortunately @jeffpulver will be in Tel Aviv and I'll be in Eilat this time, so no meetup :(
Movies are insane on it...and the Wii is pretty fun. Nothing beat 'Enders tho ;)
I can't wait to see it! When is @mazi planning to launch, do you know?
My grandad is a Liverpool fan and Anfield was the first stadium I ever went to :)
I have done extremely well thank you, I have everything I asked for and anything missing I bought online yesterday ;-)
It's a football (soccer) team Wes ;)
I am indoctrinated by a family of boys who live for arsenal. Other side of my family are die hard Chelski.
I must admit, my fanhood was directly tied to the gorrrrrjus Thierry Henry. My goonerness has never been the same since!
I spend most of my time thinking that.
Football (Arsenal) ;)
Put it this way, over the course of today I've gone from tight dress, to jeans, to sweat pants and now in pjs! So full :)
Still red, will be for a while I think...it's cheap and easy! (Not like me I must stress!)
No but I did eat an entire tiramisu. My mummy shouted at me :)
Merry Christmas :)
Creating a mahoosive powerpoint presentation. I feel like I'm back at university....except there are less Russians here.
Festive avatar. Done.
Kind of enjoying living on my own for a few days (don't tell Greg). TV all to myself means I'll be watching Friends followed by Mean Girls:)
Flights to NY booked. Things I love beginning with 'V' - Virgin. Things I hate beginning with 'V' - Verified by effing Visa.
Google on 'the worst band in the world' ---> http://tinyurl.com/5tkj2c
Wow, I wouldn't mind a KnightFrank bonus http://tinyurl.com/58fj62 but I'll settle for a free trip to Connect NYC http://tinyurl.com/5lo8ch
Oh crap. James Blunt isn't dead...and he's releasing a new single.
Any Connecters going to be staying at the Hilton Garden Inn Times Square? #connectNYC09
Don't think I can go to Jordan next week :( Things like the dollar/pound rate and the credit crunch make having fun a real chore sometimes.
Great doc just finished on BBC2 all about the Med Sea. I hope humans don't devoid the place of fish. I am guilt free, never eaten seafood :)
Just took the 11-plus. Got 15 out of 15 in under five minutes. I could have been a grammar girl :) http://tinyurl.com/5e9vvl
Everytime someone in the office says 'property' I think they're saying 'Poppy'. That gets really tiresome after a while. I need a new name.
Four cheese gnocchi and pizza (fiorentina) is a bit rich for a Wednesday lunch time. Meh, it's Christmas.
I wonder if people who don't believe in twitter are twatheists?
If anyone has any French tweeters you'd recommend, let me know...trying to convince @gwendle to stick with twitter :)
GMTV's Fiona Phillips makes me want to scratch my eyes out with emery boards. Crappy BBC reception meaning I have to tolerate the trout.
I should be eating curry with @dotBen. I has a sad. Me worky worky and not playey playey (sp?) http://tinyurl.com/2qatxg
Wow, fixing other peoples mistakes is really not how i want to spend my friday night. Wrong laptop too :(
The last day at work before you go on holiday is always a stress fuelled nightmare day of carnage. I'll need the holiday to get over it.
So hungover and so so so so sleepy.
A lot of drunken @Globrix staff. The official Christmas party photos ---> http://tinyurl.com/5vjsvt
I was knocked out of the ping-pong tourno in the first round. If it was a swimming, baking or X factor trivia contest...I'd be in the final.
A certain datafeed guru is blaring out 80s choons in the office, I bet Times Literary Supplement next door really appreciate that ;)
Just put chocolates on the office tree. Betting there'll be none left by 10.
Oh exchange rate, if I kiss you will you feel better? I miss the pound being super.
Thursday to do list: Go ice skating at Somerset House. Watch some pro Chinese pingpong. Get very drunk on Hoxton Square.
Feeling sick knowing Greg and I were on a coach in the Negev desert last night almost exactly where this crash has happened :-s
Was @twinterval lovely?
We were going into the desert tomorrw :s
Fuck RT@BreakingNewsOn At least 20 people are dead after a bus carrying Russian tourists fell off a cliff in Israel's Negev desert.
Taking a break from sunbathing, so lovely to be baking in the sun when you know everyone else is @ work. Will I go to hell for saying that?!
The building I pay Â£300 a week to live in now has human excrement in the lobby (as well as the sick in the lift). I want to kill myself.
Argggggh. So much to do before leaving at 6am tomorrow. Greg is currently recording next door w/band. Too much disorder!
I'm having a crisp sandwich for tea. I feel like I'm six again.
http://twitpic.com/wrmm - Nothing enhances Xmas like Eastenders drama on a 62" screen :)
Oh you Americans...enjoying the arse is nothing sexual! And not really enjoying it now that Villa just equalised in overtime, rats.
Enjoying the arse.
This year I have been truly gifted gorgeous. Having a lovely day in Hove with lots of family.
Off to Hove soon for Chrismukah part deux. Mmmmmm latkes (and more presents!)
The fumes from my hair dye are making me sleepy, or is it the fact I've probably consumed 15,000 calories since waking?
Leona Lewis is unbelievable on TOTP2 right now.
